lead_paragraph: STAMLER--Joseph Sr. The Board of Trustees and families of Ocean Beach Club mourn the passing of Joseph Stamler, Sr. Joe was a longtime member of Ocean Beach Club and he will be missed by all. Our sympathies are with his wife Susie, and all the members of the Stamler family. William Herrman II, President, Shawn Wallach, Secretary 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STAMLER, JOSEPH SR
